name: EV.ENGINEER™
shortDescription: Advancing high-voltage BMS and power electronics for diverse conditions.
about: EV.ENGINEER™ is a leading startup focused on developing robust Battery Management Systems (BMS) that can withstand diverse environmental conditions. Our focus is on thermal management and safety algorithms.

name: NITK Surathkal - EV Research Center
shortDescription: Academic hub for next-gen battery chemistry and charging infrastructure.
about: The EV Research Center at NITK Surathkal focuses on fundamental research in solid-state batteries and smart grid integration for EV charging.

name: iTelematics Software Private Limited
shortDescription: Interoperable charging network management and software.
about: iTelematics provides end-to-end software solutions for CPOs (Charge Point Operators) ensuring seamless interoperability and grid-aware charging.

name: Manjunath
shortDescription: Expert in EV Cybersecurity and OTA update safety.
about: Manjunath has over 20 years of experience in embedded security and currently consults on cybersecurity standards for electric vehicles.

name: Universol Enterprises
shortDescription: Light electric vehicle manufacturing and design.
about: Universol Enterprises specializes in 2-wheeler and 3-wheeler EVs designed for last-mile delivery and urban commuting.

name: SNM Polytechnic, Moodbidri
shortDescription: Technical education hub for EV skill development and vocational training.
about: SNM Polytechnic is committed to human resource development in the EV sector, offering specialized diplomas and hands-on laboratory experience for the next generation of technicians.

name: CAR Software Systems
shortDescription: Specialized testing and certification for EV safety.
about: CAR Software Systems provides independent testing services for AIS-156 and AIS-038 standards, helping OEMs achieve faster compliance.

name: Muddu Krishna
shortDescription: Researcher in advanced powertrain optimization using AI.
about: Muddu Krishna leads investigations into machine learning applications for real-time powertrain efficiency and predictive maintenance in EVs.
